channel.title: apache on tedshd's DevNote
channel.description: Recent content in apache on tedshd's DevNote

item.title: Apache - Apache Command Line on Mac / Ubuntu
item.description: Apache - Apache Command Line on Mac / Ubuntu Mac sudo apachectl start sudo apachectl restart sudo apachectl status sudo apachectl stop Ubuntu sudo /etc/init.d/apache2 start sudo /etc/init.d/apache2 restart sudo /etc/init.d/apache2 status sudo /etc/init.d/apache2 stop sudo service apache2 start sudo service apache2 restart sudo service apache2 status sudo service apache2 stop Refer - Ubuntu Linux: Start / Restart / Stop Apache Web Server

item.title: Apache - dir permission cnfig
item.description: Apache - dir permission cnfig If yooouo want use virtual host Yoou can set /etc/apache2/extra/httpd-vhosts.conf this file Add <Directory /Users/ted/tedadev/local/bomb01> AllowOverride All Options Indexes MultiViews FollowSymLinks Require all granted </Directory> <VirtualHost *:80> DocumentRoot "/Users/ted/tedadev/local/bomb01" ServerName www.bomb01.com ErrorLog "/Volumes/RamDisk/ysm-error.log" CustomLog "/Volumes/RamDisk/ysm-access.log" common </VirtualHost> Refer - Forbidden 403, You don’t have permission to access /~username/ on this server
